films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect the dead to stop humanity from creating a doomsday weapon.

films.title: Night of the Living Dead
films.description: A group of people in a rural farmhouse try to survive a zombie apocalypse.

films.title: The Blob
films.description: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and terrorizes a small town.

films.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
films.description: A group of swamp dwellers must survive attacks from giant blood-sucking leeches.

films.title: House on Haunted Hill
films.description: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a haunted house overnight.
